description.narrative:
2015 will be second year of partnership between Wakulima SACCO and Agriterra. Action plan 2015 continues contributing to the goal of Mukurwe-ini Dairy to increase milk production per cow. Wakulima SACCO aims to improve its financial services to dairy farmers, among others mobile banking.
Overall objective is to improve business operations of Wakulima SACCO. Important approach will be by benchmarking to other SACCOs, as was started in 2014.
Activities planned in action plan 2015:
- Improve uptake of Mobile banking services - Improve uptake of loan products specifically for dairy investments (in coordination with extension officers and veterinaries) - Elaborate business plan 2015-2017 - address governance challenges: - Separation of BoD Dairy/SACCO - Training of future Board members/ succession plan - Involvement external experts in BoD - Implement management tool Commercial, Efficiency and Risk triangle (strategic dashboard key performance indicators) - Marketing: promotional activities towards mobile banking and other dairy products
Improve financial services to dairy farmers, among others mobile banking.
Admin cost. The value is summarized by year
Advise days. The value is summarized by year
Incoming commitment from Directoraat Generaal Internationale Samenwerking
Incoming commitment from Wakulima Commercial SACCO Ltd.
Incoming fund from Wakulima Commercial SACCO Ltd.
Local cost. The value is summarized by year
